needs: Seeks a part-time (≈20h/week) marketing manager role or consultancy where outcomes are tightly defined, measurable, and instrumented. Prefers projects with clear constraints, budgets and governance, ability to run small probes, iterate quickly, and scale winners. Needs cross-functional access, SLOs/decision logs, and stakeholder alignment to deliver pipeline and CPA improvements.
personality: Collaborative and facilitative communicator who favors concise narrative docs, decision logs, and short demos. Values reliability, learning, humane processes, and measurable velocity. Makes decisions through small experiments and data signals, surfaces unknowns early, mentors peers by pairing, and prioritizes simplicity, accountability, and iterative, observable progress over big‑bang solutions.
